mapper.select: SELECT A.imedia, A.date, A.star, B.pic FROM t_media A JOIN ( SELECT B.imedia, A.pic FROM t_media_pics A JOIN t_media B ON A.imedia = B.imedia WHERE B.iuser = #{iuser} AND B.date = '#{date}' GROUP BY A.imedia ) B ON A.imedia = B.imedia WHERE A.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.date = #{date} AND del = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE t_media SET del = 1 WHERE imedia = #{imedia} AND del = 0
mapper.select: SELECT A.imedia, A.title, B.pic , A.star, A.comment FROM t_media A JOIN t_media_pics B ON A.imedia = B.imedia WHERE A.is_saw = #{isSaw} AND A.iuser = #{iuser} AND A.del = 0 GROUP BY B.imedia
SELECT pic FROM t_media_pics WHERE imedia = #{imedia}
